subject: Biathlon
Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
Motorcycles, Motor Bikes and Motorscooters
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The day in sports included heavy snowfall at the biathlon World Cup in Oberhof, Germany, and an upset in the quarterfinals of the Brisbane tennis tournament in Australia.
snippet: The day in sports included heavy snowfall at the biathlon World Cup in Oberhof, Germany, and an upset in the quarterfinals of the Brisbane tennis tournament in Australia.
